text: Go for it!

Shin was certainly no stranger to training pets. Often times, he would sell them away after they were trained enough, but after coming across an interesting group of younger men, he heavily considered keeping them to himself.

The men that fascinated him were sextuplets, which he discovered were NEETs after stalking them for a few weeks. With no jobs or girlfriends, it would be easy to enslave them without too many people noticing they were missing.

He had sent a few of his guards out to capture them, waiting with anticipation once he received a message that they had been successfully nabbed. Within half an hour, the guards returned, three large sacks slung over their shoulders as they entered Shin's office. Dumping out the contents revealed two sextuplets shoved into each bag, bound and gagged with tape and blindfolded with cloth.

Shin approaches Karamatsu as the blindfold and gag are removed, smirking down as he stares into his eyes.

"So, you must be Karamatsu..."

Naturally they were predictable, even with their varied interests and hobbies the sextuplets were a tightly knit group that often found things to do together. So of course they’d get kidnapped together, at least that’s Karamatsu’s opinion as he readjusts to the light and lets out a pained hiss when the tape that had muffled his earlier protests when they’d first been grabbed is ripped off.

After that it’s a matter of observing the room and his still restrained brothers before turning his attention to the man who’s clearly the one in charge.

“Yeah, that’d be me.” Is his cautious response, straining experimentally against the tape binding his wrists and ankles. “Who’re you?”

"My name is Shin, but that's not important. The important thing is that you call me 'Master'..."

"Let me explain. Starting today you'll be a part of a training program where you'll be turned into lovely, obedient pets for me. And you'll be kept as my pets for as long as I please..."

When he finally pulls away, a guard approaches behind Karamatsu with a pair of scissors, showing them of in front of him as he darkly chuckles.

Kara’s brows furrow as he listens to the man speak - not finding much of a difference between what he’s saying and what the antagonist from a horror film would probably spout to their own captives. And if being kidnapped wasn’t enough of a sign that they were in a bad situation, Shin’s monologue is the icing on the cake.

He flinches as the man strokes his skin, bracing himself for the worst. Which...turns out to be the forced kiss that leaves him sputtering as Shin pulls away only to return with a pair of scissors.

“You’re insane, there’s no other explanation. We’re not just going to be your pets!” Kara argues.

An amused expression comes across Shin's face as Kara argues.

"There's no use arguing, pet," he mocks, taking the scissors and pressing them against Kara's hoodie. "Now hold still... you don't want to get a nasty cut."

He begins to snip at his hoodie, leaving his chest and stomach bared for Shin to gawk at. His pants are next, revealing his boxers underneath.

"I think you'd make a cute snake... I even bought a big tank just for you. My pets deserve the best, after all..."

“Please, just let us go. You don’t have to do this.”

Shin pretends to consider the plea for a moment, but in reality his mind is set.

"I don't think so, pet," he says. "Now shut up and stay still while my guards wrap you up."

Shin forces the boxers into Kara's mouth, a guard coming behind him with a huge roll of tape as he's forced to stand up. The guard seals his mouth shut first, followed by the rest of his body as Kara is wrapped up like a mummy. The only parts exposed are his nipples, cock, and ass, leaving him wrapped up tight with no chance of escape.

He's wrapped up for several minutes until the tape is almost gone. Then a latex mask is placed over his head, blinding him.

"I wonder who I should suit up next..." Shin muses aloud as he looks over the other brothers.

Kara’s struggles are completely futile as he’s gagged with the remains of his own boxers and wrapped in layer after layer of tape until all his movement is reduced to minuscule twitches that take a tremendous amount of energy for the brother to make.

The mask heightens the terrifying experience by ten fold as he’s lowered back to the ground on his stomach and reduced to inching across the floor at a painstakingly slow pace. There’s no need to worry about his escaping.

Blinded as they all are, the brothers have no way of knowing Kara’s current predicament but from what they’ve heard they know they want no part in it.

Shin's gaze falls on Oso, taking off his blindfold as he examines his body and snipping away at his clothes without warning. Once his body is completely bared, Shin takes some time to play with his nipples, pinching and pulling at them.

"I think you'd make a cute sloth. You don't really do much at home anyway, right? It fits you perfectly."

"Get in, pet," Shin says as he prepares the suit. "Or else I'll force you in."

 As much as he wants to protest, the tone in Shin’s force implies that he wouldn’t enjoy whatever it took to force him into the suit.

Once Oso is completely in the suit, Shin fastens him in, placing a mask over his face to blind him once more. The suit, much like Kara's bindings, reveals Oso's cock, ass, and nipples for anyone to play with.

Oso is cautious of his new bindings, noticing the numerous patches that seemed to make contact with nearly every inch of his skin within the latex suit.

"You make a very cute sloth," he taunts, beginning to stroke his cock while he's helpless to do anything to stop it. "I'll turn the electricity off every once in a while, but for most of the day you'll be stuck.

"I wonder which of your brothers I should choose next..." he muses, eyeing Choromatsu.

Most especially Choro as he vigorously shakes his head in response to the statement, just in time with the rest of the Matsu brothers who have no idea who the man’s attention is focused on in their blindfolded state.

Shin approaches Choromatsu, ripping off his tape gag once a guard returns with a ring gag.

"I think you'd make a cute bird..." he thinks aloud, stroking his cheek and holding his nose as the guard places the gag in front of his face.

"I've got a really pretty suit for you... it's colorful and it'll make you look beautiful. I think I'll leave you suspended in the air, too. I even got you a big bird cage for you to sleep in... how does that sound, birdie?"

Choro grunts once the tape is ripped off, resisting the urge to open his mouth and let out a sound of pain from what he’s heard of what’s been happening to his brothers before him. Though he isn’t given much choice when his nose is pinched shut and he’s eventually forced to gasp for air and give the guard the perfect opportunity to lock the ring gag in place.

Now blindfolded and without the choice to close his mouth, Choro can only respond in an open mouthed gurgle to the question.

Shin gives Choro a few rough pats on the cheek, ruffling his hair afterwards. He then takes off the blindfold, wanting to see the fear in his new pet's eyes.

One guard comes forward with a multi-colored latex suit, mostly vibrant shades of green and blue with arm slots behind it for the "wings". With scissors, he cuts all of Choro's clothes off, then adjusts the suit so he can step in.

"Be a good boy for me and get inside..."

Choro blinks as he adjusts to the light, drool spilling over his chest. Out of the corner of his eye he spots the paralyzed Oso and squirming Kara and begins to shake with fear. This couldn’t be happening, not to them.

For once in his life, Choro chooses to be obstinate and stand his ground - shaking his head vehemently as his attention shifts back to the suit. Just looking at the shape he can tell that he’d be forced to his knees while his arms were kept fully extended behind his back.

"Wrong answer," he mutters, one of his guards returning with nipple clamps and attaching them to Choro's buds. The clamps tug his nipples down with the weights placed on the ends.

"If you want those clamps off, you'll get in the fucking suit. Unless you want another punishment to go along with them."

Choro squeals in pain, the sound unmuffled by his open gag, when the clamps are attached to his nipples and he feels the weights tugging them down. Not one for pain of any kind, he’s quick to struggle forward and kneel in the open suit in the proper position - whimpering as the weights swing and tug on his poor buds with every movement.

Takeru fastens Choro inside the suit, the material pressing tight against his body. Openings in the suit reveal his cock, ass, and nipples, Shin tugging at the weights as they hang freely.

"That suit looks so pretty on you..." he says, giving him a kiss to his drooling bottom lip. "But I don't think I'm going to take the clamps off after all."

Giving him a pat to the cheek, he allows a guard to tie him tight with lots of rope, hoisting him up in the middle of the room and forcing him to stay suspended in the air.

Once they're satisfied, they start to play with his nipples, letting the weights swing back and forth.

Choro groans in pain as the weights are tugged on, even the tiniest of movements brings pain to his clamped nipples and he can only let out a gargling protest when Shin announces that they’ll be left on. 

He’d only resisted for a short period of time, surely he didn’t deserve to be punished for too long.

Now the Matsu is helpless as he’s tied up and suspended from the ceiling, drool spilling over his chin and onto the floor as they continue to torture his poor nipples.

Shin turns his attention to Ichi next, approaching him and taking off the blindfold.

"You like cats, don't you?" He asks, although he already knows the answer from stalking him. "How would you feel about being my little kitty?"

Shin rips off the tape, one guard coming back with a large purple ball gag, his boss holding his nose to allow him to force it in.

Another guard retrieves a bitchsuit and cat ears, putting the ears on top of his head as Shin lays out the suit in front of Ichi. His restraints are snipped away, several guards surrounding him to make sure he doesn't run away.

Like his brothers before him, Ichi takes in the scene before him as the blindfold is taken off. Seeing Kara on the floor a wiggling mess with little movement, Oso unable to move at all, and Choro hanging from the ceiling doesn’t inspire much hope in the middle brother. 

Not when the suit laid out in front of his gagged form looks similar to the one that the oldest Matsu is in. But...a cat should be able to move and he’d already heard Choro being punished for his own refusal.

Looking between all the guards, Ichi huffs through the ball gag before moving forward and positioning himself on his elbows and knees obediently in an effort to get some lenience.
